author: Jim Vejvoda
description: The latest 007 casting rumor claims relatively unknown English actor Scott Rose-Marsh recently screen-tested for director Denis Villeneuve to play the title role in the next James Bond movie. If cast the Wolves of War actor would be the first redhead 007.
title: James Bond 26 Casting Rumor: Scott Rose-Marsh Has Screen-Tested for Director Denis Villeneuve

author: Michael Cripe
description: Ryan Reynolds is set to reprise his role as Deadpool for the next MCU team-up movie, Avengers: Doomsday.
title: Ryan Reynolds Will Appear as Deadpool in Avengers: Doomsday

author: Adam Bankhurst
description: Disney invited me to Papenburg, Germany, to not only witness the big milestone of the Disney Destiny leaving its dry dock for the first time, but also to learn how cruise ships are made at the legendary Meyer Werft shipyard and get a sneak peek at the future. While I was amazed at the ship itself and everything it will offer guests when it sets sail later this year, it was the incredible people who are bringing this dream to life that will stick with me for a lifetime.
title: Disney Invited Us to Germany to See How the Disney Destiny Was Built and How an Incredible Team Is Bringing Our Favorite Heroes & Villains to Life

author: Blythe Dujardin
description: James Gunn's Superman is now available to watch online.
title: Superman Flies Onto Digital Just Over a Month After Hitting Theaters

description: There is no free trial for HBO Max, but there is now a way to access its streaming library through an unexpected service.

description: One of the most memorable sequences in the new behind-the-scenes documentary “The Adventures in Making Superman” is an emotional on-set discussion between writer-director James Gunn and lead actor David Corenswet while shooting Superman’s big speech at the end of the DCU movie.
title: Superman Director James Gunn Posts Video of His Intense On-Set Debate With David Corenswet

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Last month, Wuchang: Fallen Feathers developer Leenzee Games promised fans that the game's performance and optimization issues would be patched out promptly. Now, patch 1.5 does seem to address many of these issues but it also makes sweeping changes to many of the game's enemies, dialogue, and story.
title: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers Performance Patch Makes Drastic Changes to Enemies and Story, and Players Aren't Happy

author: Tom Phillips
description: Scientists have identified a new species of ancient whale with cartoonish bulging eyes that they say would have made it look like a Pokémon.
title: Scientists Discover 'Deceptively Cute' Prehistoric Species That Looked Like a Pokémon

author: Lex Briscuso
description: In the age of reboots and remakes galore, there’s one beloved classic that may not ever see a fresh take: Home Alone. Director Chris Columbus recently spoke out about why he doesn't want Hollywood to remake the 1990 film, especially as it turns 35.
title: Home Alone Director Chris Columbus Insists a Remake Would Be a 'Mistake': 'It Should Be Left Alone'

author: Clint Gage
description: James Gunn and John Cena return with more of the same for the second season of Peacemaker and that’s not necessarily a bad thing.

description: Grand Theft Auto 5 players on PC just got a new update that adds DLSS 4 support, new cards for Grand Theft Auto Online, and more.

description: Mafia: The Old Country developer Hangar 13 has confirmed Free Ride mode is coming to the game as part of a free update for all players.

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Fans have been waiting years at this point for Macon Blair’s Toxic Avenger reboot film to finally hit theaters — and they’re getting what they deserve in just a couple short weeks. However, it seems as though some leaks, no pun intended, have already hit the internet… and horror editorial outlet Bloody Disgusting has come out and confirmed it, giving fans a real taste of exactly how unrated the cut coming to theaters will be.
title: The Toxic Avenger Unrated Cut's 'Monster Dong' Leaks Online — and Now It's Coming to Theaters

author: Tom Phillips
description: Cal Kestis, the hero of EA's Star Wars Jedi video games, will appear in a spin-off TV series — marking his first voiced appearance in another medium.
title: Star Wars Jedi Hero Cal Kestis Set to Appear in New Episodes of Animated Series

author: Christian Wait
description: As of August 13, Best Buy has McFarlane Marvel and DC action figures for over 50% off. Amazon has the Fantom Drives 2TB PS5 SSD for $149.45, the INIU 10000mAh Portable Charger for $19.79, the Nightmare on Elm Street 7-Film Collection for $99.95, and more.
title: Deals For Today: Over 50% Off Marvel and DC McFarlane Action Figures

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Pokémon Legends: Z-A didn’t feel like a full action game to me, but kind of more like an MMO, with its casting times, cooldowns, and behind-the-scenes math happening. That’s not necessarily a bad thing, but I do hope Legends: Z-A gets challenging enough to make me more intentionally dish out commands and think about switching Pokémon at just the right moment.
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A – Battle System First Impressions

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: See an exclusive preview of Star Trek: The Last Starship #1, the series that resurrects Captain James T. Kirk in a very bleak future.
title: See Why Star Trek: The Last Starship Is the Must-Read Sci-Fi Comic of 2025

description: The actor debuts an exclusive look at his new Prime Video series and gives advice to the cast of the FNL reboot.
title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf’s Taylor Kitsch Has a “F**king Great” Relationship with Chris Pratt and Is “Never Playing Tim Riggins Again”

author: Vikki Blake
description: Battlefield 6 publisher EA is making "changes" to Rush mode to "better balance" the gameplay between attacking and defending players.
title: Battlefield 6 Knows You Don't Like Rush Mode And Has Already Cut MCOM Timers By 33%

author: Tom Phillips
description: Russell T Davies, the showrunner of Doctor Who, has said he is not a part of ongoing conversations between the BBC and Disney regarding the series' future — but promised its upcoming spin-off series would be "brilliant."
title: Doctor Who Showrunner Says 'I Literally Don't Know' When Asked About Series Future, But Hypes Spin-Off as 'Even Better Than We Thought'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Definitive Edition is out now, and of course modders are already pushing it to its limits. But the way they’re doing it is a lot of fun — and is perhaps the closest we’ll get to seeing a Waaagh! visualized on-screen.
title: Waaagh! Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War Modder Pushes Definitive Edition to Its Limit by Seeing How Many Ork Boyz It Takes to Crash the Game

author: Vikki Blake
description: David Hayter — who for many years gave Snake his signature gruff voice — has finally "forgiven" series creator Hideo Kojima for not casting him in 2015's Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain after playing the "amazing" game.
title: Snake Star 'Stopped Being a Baby' And Finally Played Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain After Being Replaced by Kiefer Sutherland — 'It's Amazing'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel has made a number of edits to Thunderbolts*/The New Avengers' poster to promote the movie's upcoming Disney+ release — including the odd removal of weapons previously held by Bucky and Yelena, and the deletion of one character completely.
title: Marvel Fans Say Thunderbolts Now 'Just Look Silly' After Disney+ Poster Edits Out Their Guns and Removes One Character Completely

description: Diablo 4 fans believe Blizzard has leaked the action RPG’s next class via an internal build name.

author: Vikki Blake
description: PayPal is the latest payment system to stop processing Steam transactions in some countries due to alleged concerns about explicit games on Valve's storefront.
title: Valve Confirms PayPal Has 'Stopped Processing' Steam Transactions In Some Countries As NSFW Game Row Continues

author: Tom Phillips
description: McDonald's has announced fresh restrictions aimed at combating scalpers, as it launches the next wave of its enormously popular Pokémon promotion in Japan.
title: McDonald's Announces Pokémon Crackdown After Scalpers Scoop Up Card Stock, Waste Food

description: This week, DC Studios co-CEO James Gunn made the surprise announcement that Superman would see its digital release on Friday, August 15 — just over a month after it launched in theaters. Now, Gunn has explained why.
title: DC Studios Co-CEO James Gunn Explains Why Superman Is Getting a Digital Release So Soon After the Movie Hit Theaters

description: From invasive eyes to a redesigned xenomorph, director Noah Hawley breaks down how the grotesque creatures of Alien: Earth were made.
